title: Kafe Kara Hajimaru Love Life
original_name: カフェから始まる LoveLife
sinopse: The lovers’ refuge, Café Gem. There, the college student Kouta fell in love at first sight with the regular customer, Nanjyou. Due to unexpected events, he becomes a freeloader in Nanjyou’s house, and the daily heartthrob begins, but…!?
